local_intent: Transfer the grasped white_plate to the pose above the red plate: ensure visibility, move above target, fine-align, and verify arrival.
assumptions: white_plate is currently held in the gripper (ObjectInGripper satisfied)
red_plate is reachable and can be perceived by ScanForTarget/IsObjectVisible
coherence_with_global: Matches GLOBAL_BT transfer phase: perceives red plate if needed, moves to above_red_plate with prescribed timeout, aligns before lowering/placement steps that follow.
